unnormalised: Boro, konnem-i dal-chawal kail'lea uprant pott fugta mhunn sanglam, kiteak? Classic Bharoti digestive drama! Polle, mhoji Nani astali, ji lohkachem nakham-ui pachounk shak'li (zait), ti-ui kednam-kednam dukhi kortali. Tunv ekloch nhoi, bhai!
normalised: Haanv, konnain tori dal chawal khalya uprant pot futta mhunn vicharlem, hãv? Classic Indian digestive drama! Pollounk, mhoji Nani ji lohkacheo mechuy-ui pachoytali, ti-i kednanna dukhi astali. Tem fokot tumhich nhoi, bhai!

unnormalised: Poilem, tunvem vichar korunk zai *kitlech* prokarachem dal mhunn. Moong dal samanya ritin shant asta, punn tem urad dal? Hoo boy, tokli ghott korun rav. Ani kitlem tup tujea auyen (va tunvem, konnachi-i tuka shiksha nhoi!) bitor ghatlem? Tup ruchik asta, mhaka khobor, punn zaitich tupak lagun tuje pott asa toxem bairi traffican atklolea rikshaw-i bhaxen disunk lagta. Tem tujea potta bhitorlem Mumbai monsoon asata, samanya ritin.
normalised: Poilem, tumi kitlea torechi dal mhunn vicharunk zai. Moong dal sadharanponnan chill, punn ti urad dal? Hoo boy, tayar rav. Ani, kitlem ghee tumchea avoynen, vo tumi, konnachich nimnnuk korunk nhoi, tanne tantun uddoylem? Ghee ruchik asta, khõchich dubhavnni nhoi, punn chodd zait zalear tumchem pot trafifintle ricshaw-e bhaxen futtat. Tem Mumbai monsoom tumchea gutant, mhunntt’tat tench.

unnormalised: Ani uprant tandull asat. Dhovo tandull ek lapun ravpi gunhegar zaunk xakta. Brown tandull tuzo novo best friend zaunk xakta. Eke scooter-ichi Royal Enfield-acher upgrading korun gheunchea bhaxen vichar kor - pachounk vell lagta, punn rastyacher boro cholta. Ani tandulla sangatak papad? Tikhat limbi? Tuka zoll divpak sadhi vostu boro zavnk dina, mhojea ixtta!
normalised: Uprant asa tandull. Dhovo tandull ek lhurvik gunnekari zaunk xokta. Brown tandull tumcho novo ixtt zaunk xokta. Tem eka scooteran thaun Royal Enfield-ak upgrade kelea bhaxen vichar korat – pachonk vell lagta, punn rodd-ar bori samball kortat. Ani, chawalchea sangata papad? Tikhat aachar? Ujeak tel ghatlea bhaxen, mhoje ixtta!

unnormalised: Ani sachi sang, tunv jevtanna Thums Up va Limca ghott ghott dhunvkurta? Hea soglea fizzy drinks-ak lagun tuje pott eke birthday party-ntlea balloon bhaxen fukta. Chaas va udok pienk rav; tuje pott tuka dhanyavad ditolem. Hanv doctor nhoi punn hem mhojea anubhavantlean mhaka khobor asa.
normalised: Ani saty sangonk, tumi tem Thums Up vo Limca tumchea jevnnachea vangdda piyetat? Te soglle fizzy drinks tumchem pot birthday party-intle balloon-a bhaxen futtat. Chaas vo udok piyat; tumchem pot tumkam dhanyavad ditolem. Hanv D-R nhoi punn hem anubhovanlean sangtam.

unnormalised: Nimannem, jevtak kail'lea uprant thoddem chalonk zai. Bollywood polleun doriacher poddlolea maslle bhaxen sofa-cher poddonk naka. 10-15 minutam haluk chollop chamatkar korunk xakta. Pun zori tem sarlem na zalear, eka boro gastroenterologist-ak mell. Tankam lagun tem zaitich dal-chawal kail'lea bhaxen gombhir zaunk xakta. Tankam lagun tests-ui suchevpak xaktat, ani zori tum ulole na zalear, tuka ek tras zaunk xakta. Bori kismet ani tujem pott kednach tujea favarank astolem!
normalised: Nimannek, jevnn khalya uprant thoddo vell bhõvat. Sofa-cher bhes gheun Bollywood pollellea eka beached whale-a bhaxen poddonk naka. Dhirenn dha thaun pandhra minttam bhõvlear borem zata. Punn tem sodanch cholot ravt zalear, ek boro gastroenterologist-ak mellat. Tem fokot chodd dal chawal-a von voddlem asunk xokta. Te test suchoyt, ani tumkam eka sodanchchea vixoyak durlox korunk naka. Dev tumche sangatik ravonk ani tumchem pot tumchea favrant asonk!
